name: Wiz Khalifa's KK Farm
description:
To be the greatest, you gotta learn from the greatest. In the post-prohibition world of farming, elevated entrepreneur Wiz Khalifa teaches you how to plant, grow, and harvest the finest herb on earth in this epic new simulation game.

Follow in Wiz Khalifa’s footsteps as you build your own weed empire from the ground up.

- Tap to plant and grow quality strains for your clients
- Swipe to get your products to market and get your paper up
- Invest your profits to expand your grow op
- Boost your harvest with hydroponics and LED grow lights
- Level up to unlock accessories and rare mystery strains

Please note: Wiz Khalifa’s KK Farm is free to download and play. Some in-game items are available for purchase using real money.
